name: mikroe.click.rfid
short_description: RFid click features CR95HF 13.56 MHz contactless transceiver as well as trace antenna. The click is designed to run on a 3.3V power supply only. It communicates with the target MCU via mikroBUSâ„¢ UART (TX, RX), SPI (MISO, MOSI, SCK, CS) INT, RST, PWM and AN lines.
